feed.title: Silicon Notes Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Silicon Notes:
entry.content:
No significant changes recently, just getting a new Actions, tagging, and release system worked out. But if you want:

docker pull docker.io/bityard/silicon:0.1.2

Hugs and kisses, Charles

entry.title: New release for Silicon Notes: 0.1.5
entry.content:
Get yer docker images here: https://hub.docker.com/r/bityard/silicon/tags

Notable changes:

  • Updated dependencies
  • Misc cleanup
  • Show related pages on non-existant pages
  • Refactor colors to use a 'color token' system
  • Format JS with Prettier
  • Views for pages with slugs will always redirect to the canonical slug
  • Switch project management from poetry to uv
  • Various README improvements

Hugs and Kisses, Charles
